pages.title: Ritual of Purification
pages.text: Click the eye icon for help.

The most basic, and most likely the first ritual an artisan will do is the $(thing)Ritual of Purification$().$(br2)This ritual, made with a $(l:ritualism/ritual_circles)small circle$(), allows one to transform $(l:intro/impure_ash)Impure Ash$() into $(l:intro/alchemical_ash)Alchemical Ash$(). This process is elementary: simply toss $(item)Impure Ash$() into the circle, and it'll be converted to $(item)Alchemical Ash$() at a 16:1 ratio.$(br2)Note that this ritual is highly inefficient, so avoid using it for large quantities.
